---
title: "AOH_Masks_Filtered"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(terra)

fs  <- list.files("Spatial/Patches", "\\.tif$", full.names = TRUE)
out <- "Spatial/AOH_Masks_Filtered"

for (f in fs) {
  r <- rast(f)
  m <- ifel(!is.na(r), 1, NA)          # 1 where there was any value, NA stays NA
  writeRaster(m, file.path(out, basename(f)), overwrite = TRUE)
}
```
